guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

post.title: What did you do while ruqqus was down?

body:
Tried to surf Reddit, got extremely fed up with the already shitty intrusive ads worsened by companies's horrible attempts at trying to appeal to us, and deactivated my account.

Thanks for existing Ruqqus!

Tried to surf Reddit, got extremely fed up with the already shitty intrusive ads worsened by companies's horrible attempts at trying to appeal to us, and deactivated my account.

Thanks for existing Ruqqus!

post.body: I played minecraft and moderated the server
post.body_html: I played minecraft and moderated the server
post.title: What did you do while ruqqus was down?

body: I formed the Kingdom of Ireland, took the Duchy of Galloway and destroyed Scotland from within, married my daughter to the King of Norway, helped him claim the remainder of Scotland and then watched as England pulled its big boy pants on and took half of France while leaving me to attack their western borders freeing Gwynedd from their control as my wife wanted it, she lost it but kept the county of Herefordshire, then I died and now my Son rules the lands of Ireland and I browse Ruqqus. Long live the Crusader Kings! Deus vult!!!
body_html: I formed the Kingdom of Ireland, took the Duchy of Galloway and destroyed Scotland from within, married my daughter to the King of Norway, helped him claim the remainder of Scotland and then watched as England pulled its big boy pants on and took half of France while leaving me to attack their western borders freeing Gwynedd from their control as my wife wanted it, she lost it but kept the county of Herefordshire, then I died and now my Son rules the lands of Ireland and I browse Ruqqus. Long live the Crusader Kings! Deus vult!!!

Not worry about it.  my existence doesn’t hinge on a website being available or not.  Especially this website.  It’s just the same boring shit over and over again.  

Ruqqus was a mistake.  I hope you’re all cataloged by the fbi

Not worry about it. my existence doesn’t hinge on a website being available or not. Especially this website. It’s just the same boring shit over and over again.
